thread.title: BRIEF-WP Carey Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $1.31

title: BRIEF-WP Carey Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $1.31
text: February 23, 2018 / 12:34 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-WP Carey Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share $1.31 Reuters Staff Feb 23 (Reuters) - WP Carey Inc: * W. P. CAREY INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $5.30 TO $5.50 * Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.31 * Q4 REVENUE $185.3 MILLION * Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.13 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $4.56 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * WP CAREY - QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND RAISED TO $1.01/SHARE, EQUIVALENT TO ANNUALIZED DIVIDEND RATE OF $4.04/SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
